snippet.title: Scarlet Lake - Official Announcement Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Here's your look at the trailer for Scarlet Lake, an upcoming retro survival horror game where everything is not what it seems. In Scarlet Lake, you control Ben Murphy, a detective sent to investigate the strange on-goings in a small town, only to be caught in a nightmare surrounded by terrifying creatures. What dark mysteries will you uncover in Scarlet Lake? Scarlet Lake will be available on PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
